recommendations: Svetlana Sambell
Senior Vice President Strategic Development
February 19, 2010, Svetlana worked with Fred but at different companies

Fred is that rare breed of engineer - businessman - leader who doesn't just say, but rather DO. He creates on the spot and shares his innovative ideas with partners and colleagues out of his heart. He spends so much time with the customers working on the projects and asks enough questions to thoroughly understand the goal. Then he lays out possible approaches to the solution and collaboratively (to the business owner of the project) and picks the most effective and flexible path. As a side benefit, as I serve on the Board of Directors with BMA Phoenix as past/President, many projects with Fred that he has brought to the Board’s review are always on the edge of the technologies.  I feel privileged to have the opportunity working with Fred and recommend him highly.

summary: (@fvongraf)  - Simply put I help companies succeed through growth. From my fractional CTO roles to my hand picked team of developers. Working on blockchain, crypto, machine learning, conversational interfaces, etc. Get your SaaS solution out, enhance your current code, augment your current development team or something in between...Personal BIO: My introduction to technology really started when my mom bought my first computer at age 8 (a VIC20) and with my constant tinkering with electronics prior to that. I’m a principle driven person, with a passion (overused but true) for business, people, start-ups, software development, communications and technology.I have been fortunate to have met so many amazing people over the years and gotten my hands dirty on so many different projects and technologies. From running a BBS back in the day, helping get several ISPs started from the ground up (you get to do and learn everything there), setting up commercial networks for governments, security (both physical and data), managing tier 1 mission critical application teams in Fortune 50 company, owning R&D labs worldwide, large scale server farms, multi-million dollar budgets... Born in Sweden, grew up in the US, I’m a US Citizen. Enjoy traveling, biking, hiking, photography, reading, SCUBA, deep work, continuous improvement / learning and especially spending time with my awesome family.I also get to blow things up while I work for Burningman on the Pyro Team.  That's right, I get paid to blow up the man, be jealous!  Oh and I get to bring some fire fun to Arizona with events like Maker Faire Phoenix and WinterBlast.Specialties: Have 18+ years professional experience, 12+ years in management, from CTO work, mentorship, board positions, project management, people management to executive management. Strong marketing, business development with a technical background both with Start-ups & Enterprise.
name: Fred von Graf, PMP
title: Founder W3M
